Message: MicroStrategy folders are now entered by their ID instead of their name. This change is breaking.
ReleaseNote:
# How to upgrade your extraction

If you use a MicroStrategy folder for your extractions you have to enter itÂ´s ID instead of the name into the folder ID textbox of the destination settings of your extraction.
You can find the ID of a folder by right clicking it in the MicroStrategy Workstation and select Properties.
